---
description: Represents all possible room types available for use in spawn config
---

# RoomType

### Values:

| Name        | Description        |
| ----------- | ------------------ |
| **Unknown** | Unknown Room Type. |

#### Light Containment Zone

| Name               | Description                                  |
| ------------------ | -------------------------------------------- |
| **LczArmory**      | Light Containment Zone's Armory.             |
| **LczCurve**       | Light Containment Zone's Curved Hall.        |
| **LczStraight**    | Light Containment Zone's Straight Hall.      |
| **Lcz914**         | Light Containment Zone's SCP-914 room.       |
| **LczCrossing**    | Light Containment Zone's 4-Way intersection. |
| **LczTCross**      | Light Containment Zone's 3-Way intersection. |
| **LczCafe**        | Light Containment Zone's PC-15's room.       |
| **LczPlants**      | Light Containment Zone's VT-00's room.       |
| **LczToilets**     | Light Containment Zone's Water Closet.       |
| **LczAirlock**     | Light Containment Zone's Airlock room.       |
| **Lcz173**         | Light Containment Zone's PT-00 room.         |
| **LczClassDSpawn** | Light Containment Zone's Class-D spawn room. |
| **LczCheckpointB** | Light Containment Zone's Checkpoint B room.  |
| **LczGlassBox**    | Light Containment Zone's GR-18's room.       |
| **LczCheckpointA** | Light Containment Zone's Checkpoint A room.  |
| **Lcz330**         | Light Containment Zone's SCP-330 room.       |

#### Heavy Containment Zone

| Name                    | Description                                           |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| **Hcz079**              | SCP-079 room.                                         |
| **HczEzCheckpointA**    | Entrance Checkpoint A room.                           |
| **HczEzCheckpointB**    | Entrance Checkpoint B room.                           |
| **HczArmory**           | 3-Way Intersection + Armory room.                     |
| **Hcz939**              | SCP-939 room.                                         |
| **HczHid**              | MicroHID straight hall.                               |
| **Hcz049**              | SCP-049 + SCP-173's room.                             |
| **HczCrossing**         | 4-Way intersection.                                   |
| **Hcz106**              | SCP-106 room.                                         |
| **HczNuke**             | Nuke room.                                            |
| **HczTesla**            | Tesla straight hall.                                  |
| **HczCurve**            | Curved hall.                                          |
| **Hcz096**              | SCP-096 room.                                         |
| **HczStraight**         | Straight hall with ceiling fan.                       |
| **HczTestRoom**         | Test room's straight hall.                            |
| **HczElevatorA**        | Elevator System A room.                               |
| **HczElevatorB**        | Elevator System B room.                               |
| **HczCrossRoomWater**   | Cross room with waterfall.                            |
| **HczCornerDeep**       | Corner.                                               |
| **HczIntersectionJunk** | 3-Way intersection with junk blocking the passage.    |
| **HczIntersection**     | 3-Way intersection.                                   |
| **HczStraightC**        | Straight hall with sanitary pipelines.                |
| **HczStraightPipeRoom** | Straight hall with pipelines obstructing the passage. |
| **HczStraightVariant**  | Straight hall variant.                                |
| **Hcz127**              | SCP-330 room.                                         |
| **HczServerRoom**       | Storage / server room.                                |

#### Entrance Zone

| Name                     | Description                                           |
| ------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| **EzVent**               | Red Vent room.                                        |
| **EzIntercom**           | Intercom room.                                        |
| **EzGateA**              | Gate A room.                                          |
| **EzDownstairsPcs**      | Straight hall with PCs on a lower level.              |
| **EzCurve**              | Curved hall.                                          |
| **EzPcs**                | Straight hall with PCs on the main level.             |
| **EzCrossing**           | 4-Way intersection.                                   |
| **EzCollapsedTunnel**    | Red Collapsed Tunnel Room.                            |
| **EzConference**         | Straight hall with Dr. L’s or Dr. Gear’s locked room. |
| **EzChef**               | Straight hall with Chef’s locked room.                |
| **EzStraight**           | Straight hall.                                        |
| **EzStraightColumn**     | Straight hall with seasonal object placement.         |
| **EzCafeteria**          | Cafeteria Room.                                       |
| **EzUpstairsPcs**        | Straight hall with PCs and upper level.               |
| **EzGateB**              | Gate B room.                                          |
| **EzShelter**            | Shelter room.                                         |
| **EzTCross**             | 3-Way intersection.                                   |
| **EzCheckpointHallwayA** | Hall before entrance/heavy checkpoint A.              |
| **EzCheckpointHallwayB** | Hall before entrance/heavy checkpoint B.              |
| **EzSmallrooms**         | Hall with Dr. L’s and conference room 9b locked room. |

#### Special Rooms

| Name        | Description           |
| ----------- | --------------------- |
| **Pocket**  | The Pocket Dimension. |
| **Surface** | The Surface.          |
